content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Pipes connecting the boiler and offshore pump, including:
  - Pipe (position -12.5, 15.5)
  - Pipe (position -13.5, 20.5)
  - Pipe (position -13.5, 15.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to offshore pump
- Ensure that there are no placement blockages between the boiler and offshore pump before attempting to connect them. Check the positions of pipes and other entities that may obstruct the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
